thread.title: Big Drama Show as Golovkin eyes breakout fight at Garden
thread.title_full: Big Drama Show as Golovkin eyes breakout fight at Garden - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Tim Dahlberg, Ap Sports Columnist
title: Big Drama Show as Golovkin eyes breakout fight at Garden
text: Photo: Bebeto Matthews, AP WBA middleweight boxing champion Gennady Golovkin, from Kazakhstan, listens during the final press conference at Madison Square Garden for his bout with IBF middleweight champion David Lemieux, from Canada, Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in New York. Golovkin and Lemieux will meet in a championship unification fight at the Garden on Saturday Oct. 17. WBA middleweight boxing champion Gennady Golovkin, from Kazakhstan,... NEW YORK (AP) — If all goes according to plan for Gennady Golovkin on Saturday night at Madison Square Garden, he'll knock out David Lemieux, become a pay-per-view draw, and get a lot of people a lot more interested in boxing again. WBA middleweight boxing champion Gennady Golovkin, from Kazakhstan, listens during the final press conference at Madison Square Garden for his bout with IBF middleweight champion David Lemieux, from Canada, Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in New York. Golovkin and Lemieux will meet in a championship unification fight at the Garden on Saturday Oct. 17. WBA middleweight boxing champion Gennady Golovkin, from Kazakhstan,... NEW YORK (AP) — If all goes according to plan for Gennady Golovkin on Saturday night at Madison Square Garden, he'll knock out David Lemieux, become a pay-per-view draw, and get a lot of people a lot more interested in boxing again.
